items.value: %02@ of %01@ found the existence of a hidden history book about humans somewhere in %89b kingdom.
%02@ decided not to look for the hidden history book as it was just a waste of time.
%02@ decided to create a search party to look for the hidden history book.
The search party found the hidden history book.
The search party did not find the hidden history book. %02@ decided to let it go.
Upon reading the book, %02@ wants to uphold the old ways and discarded all the research for new technologies. Some kings and governor are supportive of this decision while others are not.
Upon reading the book, %02@ thinks that the old ways will not make the kingdom better. %87a decided to hide the book again in a much harder place to find.
